trans-unit.source: Enables the sharing of contextual information, such as property validation, parent activity, and so on, across validators during the compilation process.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverar delning av kontextuella information, till exempel egenskapen verifiering, överordnade aktiviteten och så vidare, över verifierare under kompilering.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] For a list of initial property values regarding an instance of the ValidationManager class, see the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]En lista över inledande egenskapsvärden om en instans av klassen ValidationManager finns det <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A>konstruktor.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"></xref> class using the identified service provider.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av identifierade service-providern.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values regarding an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager> class, see the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En lista över inledande egenskapsvärden om en instans av den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager>klassen, finns det <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A>konstruktor.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that locates a GUID identified service.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IServiceProvider>som söker efter en GUID som identifierats tjänst.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"></xref> class using the identified service provider and indicates whether child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> classes should be validated.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"> </xref> klassen med identifierade tjänsteleverantören och anger om underordnade <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> klasser som ska verifieras.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values regarding an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager> class, see the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En lista över inledande egenskapsvärden om en instans av den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager>klassen, finns det <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A>konstruktor.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that locates a GUID identified service.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IServiceProvider>som söker efter en GUID som identifierats tjänst.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to validate the child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> classes of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>att verifiera underordnat <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> klasser av aktuellt <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the stack object that a validator can use to make information available to nested validators.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger stack-objektet som en verifieraren kan använda för att göra informationen tillgänglig för kapslade verifierare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"></xref> that a validator can use to make information available to nested validators.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"> </xref> som en verifieraren kan använda för att göra informationen tillgänglig för kapslade verifierare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the service object of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar serviceobjektet i angivna <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the <xref:System.Type> of service object to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Ett objekt som anger den <xref:System.Type>av tjänstobjekt om du vill hämta.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A service object of type serviceType, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if there is no service object of type serviceType.
trans-unit.target: Ett serviceobjekt av typen serviceType , eller en null-referens ( i Visual Basic) om det finns inget serviceobjekt av typen serviceType .

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of validators that are associated with a type by looking up the validator attribute applied on the type.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en matris med verifierare som är associerade med en typ genom att leta upp attributet validator för typen.

trans-unit.source: If the hash table of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes contains the <xref:System.Type> indicated by `type`, an array of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes is returned.
trans-unit.target: Om hash-tabellen för <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator>klasser innehåller den <xref:System.Type>anges av `type`, en matris med <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator>klasser returneras.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator>

trans-unit.source: If the hash table does not contain the <xref:System.Type> indicated by `type`, a new hash table of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes is created and then an array of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes is returned.
trans-unit.target: Om hash-tabellen inte innehåller den <xref:System.Type>anges av `type`, en ny hashtabell med <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator>klasser skapas och sedan en matris med de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator>klasser returneras.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"></xref> class to find.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>av <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"> </xref> klassen för att hitta.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: En matris med <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"> </xref> klasser.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> classes should be validated.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om underordnade <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> klasser som ska verifieras.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> classes should be validated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om underordnade <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> klasser ska vara validerad, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
